website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a well-built volleyball shoe at a reasonable price, the Asics Upcourt 3 may be what you need. The underfoot cushioning on this product is perfect for all the jumping and running that you’d be doing. But the star on this model is the high-traction rubber that lets wearers be swift on the floor.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers have marveled at how comfortable the Asics Upcourt 3 was for indoor sports
The lightweight nature of the trainer has pleased numerous volleyball players
Many athletes approve of the grippy outsole used on this Asics volleyball shoe
The footwear is considered reasonably priced by a good number of consumers
A lot of folks have complimented the aesthetics of this product
Plenty of individuals like that it had ample space for toe splaying while the heel is snugly secured
cons: According to several owners, the overall structure is too soft and provided no lateral and ankle support
This pair of volleyball shoes is not durable, said some users
The footbed is too flat that it caused arch pain for a few people

customer_reviews.title: Sizing, comfort, use
customer_reviews.text: Use for badminton. Very good cushioning for heels and soles which have become more sensitive - can't think why - but it might be something to do with a) the badminton racket or b) my age. Trainers are usually on the small size in my experience but these need to be bought at your normal size - they are a generous fit and width. Tried the 'usual' size - I buy (10) - in trainers initially but these were very much too big and I needed to buy my normal shoe size (9).
customer_reviews.author: Iris - Merseyside

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, this shoe is very good value. The sizing is spot-on, no deviation from my usual shoe size (7.5 UK). Shoe is light and comfortable. I've used these for badminton and it provides good amount support and grip too. Very good. By the way, the one I purchased is racer blue color....in the pictures it looks like darker blue...but in actual, it very much like the blue m&m :)
customer_reviews.author: skw

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Having been a loyal user of different types Prince squash shoes for many years, I decided to try these ASICS shoes based on the reviews and better price. It’s been about 3 weeks and I haven’t been disappointed. It’s also lighter than the Prince and no sore toes. I’ll stick to Prince rackets in combination with these great shoes by ASICS 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: R McDoom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light and, so far, are a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and so far, after only three outings on the squash court, they have a great floor grip and are very light in weight. A truie assessment can only really be given after a number of months of regular usage. Nevertheless, Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peter Landon

customer_reviews.title: Asics is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and hold my foot well. But I had same type/brand before, so I knew what i'm buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Komora

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sqash shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great squash shoes for the price. Nice colour, good foot support etc. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tooring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, don't rub (even first time wearing). No squeaking..... Love them.
customer_reviews.author: R J Bjork

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Alway choose ASICS as they have 1/2 sizes which prevents stubbing toe whilst playing. Good product therefore happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Risbec

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the gel blade or gel rocket its far less durable, inside and out. Grip and performance is fine but if you want something that lasts longer go for the blade or rocket
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I received the shoes and it came according to my exchange request. I am very pleased with the sports shoes. Thanks to Amazon too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: André Luiz nassimbeni de Jesus

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable,good ankle support and stability during use.
customer_reviews.author: robert hallam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe with excellent grip, shame I’m so poor at squash!!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: None grip
customer_reviews.text: I have found that on 2 different wood floors, these items have little grip, so i had on both occasions put my old ones back on.
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good buy. Confortable and good looking pair of squash shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by fellow sportsmen as a good quality and reasonably priced squash shoe
customer_reviews.author: Colin Brock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was same day as stated. and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kool

customer_reviews.title: First time normal usage on court - right shoe seam at top pulled apart (I bought size 13)
customer_reviews.text: Seam falling apart after first time usage? A joke! The shoe is not too small for my feet (I am a sports shoe size 13).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Upcourt 3 Squash Shoes
product_meta.description: On the squash court you need a range of skills if you want to defeat your opponent; speed, agility and tactics come from within, but stability, grip and support give you shoes. The UPCOURT 3 is an indoor anti-sign shoe, designed for squash, badminton and other fast field sports. The EVA midsole improves bounce properties and reduces the possibility of breaking the midsole, while the sole in NC rubber with more natural rubber than traditional solid rubber, it offers better traction on all types of field. A combination of mesh reinforcements and synthetic material ensures greater stability of the shoe, which translates into greater stability and protection of the foot as you accelerate from one side of the field to the other.\nLight; comfortable fit; flexible; EVA midsole; NC rubber; internal EVA coating; exceptional adhesion; combination of synthetic and network reinforcements.
